## Checklist

- [ ] Entry follows the existing table format
- [ ] Not a minor variant of something already listed
- [ ] Has working code (not paper-only or "coming soon")
- [ ] Actively maintained (updated within last 12 months)
- [ ] Added in alphabetical order within its section (or by MTEB score for model tables)
- [ ] Link works and points to the right place

## Why does this belong?

<!-- Pick one or more: -->
- [ ] Strong benchmark results (MTEB score, BEIR, etc.)
- [ ] Significant adoption (stars, downloads, production use)
- [ ] Fills a gap not covered by existing entries
- [ ] Paradigm shift / emerging approach (for Horizon section)

- [ ] **Practitioner's Edge** ‚Äî Solves a specific problem the canonical options don't
- [ ] üî≠ **Horizon** ‚Äî Worth watching, new capabilities or paradigm shift
